alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Mahoning; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 1:09AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Trumbull, Mahoning, Ashtabula, Erie and Crawford Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 108 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Geneva-On-The-Lake to near Middlefield to near Garrettsville to near Salem. Movement was east at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Erie, Youngstown, Warren, Ashtabula, Meadville, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Cortland, Edinboro, Geneva, Newton Falls, Lordstown, North Kingsville, Cambridge Springs and Kinsman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Mahoning; Trumbull
